item.description:
Come get a fabulous Manicure & Pedicure for just $35.00 plus tip! I'm limiting this to 5 women for that's all they can take at one time. Please sign up only if you are absolutely sure you want to come. If your not sure, or if you cancel at the last minute or don't show up, you may be taking a spot for someone else!

Now, Let's Get Pampered!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a name tag that says, "Girl's Just Wanna Have Fun!"

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Manicures & Pedicures at Fancy Nails in Hyannis
